sourcesContent: import{INVALID_ARGUMENT as r}from"@liff/consts";import{isIpad as e,createLiffError as t}from"@liff/util";import{fetch as o,getEndPoint as n}from"@liff/server-api";import{getLineVersion as i}from"@liff/get-line-version";import{getOS as f}from"@liff/get-os";var a=function(r){return"object"==typeof r&&null!==r&&function(r){return"string"==typeof r||r instanceof String}(r.type)};function s(e){return Promise.reject(t(r,e))}function m(r){if(!function(r){return Array.isArray(r)&&r.every(a)}(r))return s("Parameter 'messages' must be an array of { type, ... }");var e=r.length;return e<1||e>5?s("Number of messages should be in range 1 to ".concat(5,".")):o(n("message"),{method:"POST",body:JSON.stringify({messages:r})}).catch(u)}var u=function(r){if("403"===r.code){var t="12.0.0"===i(),o="ios"===f(),n=e();t&&(o||n)&&window.alert("LINEアプリをLINE 12.0.1以降にアップデートしてください。\nPlease update your LINE app to LINE 12.0.1 or later.")}throw r};export{u as alertToPromptUpdate,m as sendMessages};
